sentence.Network_en: Each morning cleaners make sure everything is spotless.

sentence.Network_en: A spotless stove told us that his mother is a diligent housekeeper.
sentence.Network_cn: 炉子清洁无瑕就表明他母亲是个勤劳的主妇.

entry.tran: 极其干净的;一尘不染的
entry.def: Something that is spotless is completely clean.

example.ex: Each morning cleaners make sure everything is spotless...
example.tran: 每天早晨，清洁工们会把一切都打扫得干干净净。

example.ex: Even in the most spotless homes, carpets need regular cleaning to keep them looking good.
example.tran: 即便是在最干净的房子里，地毯也需要定期清洁以保持美观。
